channel.title: Server errors... help please?
channel.description:
java.lang.NullPointerException [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(PlayerAssistant.java:1534) [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1535) [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:155) [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:177)
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "I" [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:580) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:615) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.Commands.playerCommands(Commands.java:64) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.Commands.processPacket(Commands.java:42) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:137) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1932) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:177)
get the top error when someone dies, and the bottom i have no idea where that error is coming from except commands.java? any idea how to fix either? thanks.

item.title: Server errors... help please?
item.dc:creator: @NRR NRR
item.description:
@NRR wrote:

java.lang.NullPointerException [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(PlayerAssistant.java:1534) [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1535) [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:155) [12/15/14 8:35 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:177)

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “I” [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:580) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:615) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.Commands.playerCommands(Commands.java:64) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.Commands.processPacket(Commands.java:42) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:137) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1932) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) [12/15/14 9:02 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:177)

get the top error when someone dies, and the bottom i have no idea where that error is coming from except commands.java? any idea how to fix either? thanks.
